Posts.Content: dsueb wrote: I received some information about my biopsy today. I have intermediate grade invasive ductal carcinoma and metastatic ductal carcinoma in my lymph nodes. I have not seen anything in writing yet. Neither person I spoke with would give me any rating numbers, the radiologist said I needed to not worry about numbers and just wait until I see the specialist, which concerns me because he has been very upfront and honest with me both times I have seen him and I specifically asked him for these. Maybe I shouldn't think this way but I find that concerning. I have a 1.0 cm x 0.8 cm mass, satellite mass (unsure of size) and a 5 cm x 2.6 cm x 4.6 cm in my axillary lymph node. Any helpful insight would be appreciated. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy Diagnosis, received.. Curious dsueb dsueb

Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2018 12:33PM dsueb wrote: Thank you for the responses Georgia1 and gb2115. I know you both understand how hard it is knowing but only a limited amount of information and having to wait for the rest. I appreciate your posts!
Posts.Title: Biopsy Diagnosis, received.. Curious dsueb dsueb

Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2018 12:38PM dsueb wrote: Thank you all so much for the information. It is sincerely appreciated. My appointment with a surgeon was made for this coming Friday. I will get some answers very soon. Things are going very quickly. Nice...but a little scary too
